title: [Yegharren Plain, Forest's Edge]
description: Slippery, moss-covered roots protrude from the rotting carpet of fallen leaves that covers the ground, ready to trip the unwary who move too quickly along the uneven trail.  What little light filters through the heavy, twisted branches of the trees illuminates the forest with an eerie greenish glow.
